title: 2007 Copa Panamericana
text:
The Copa Panamericana 2007 was a minor <a href="association%20football">football</a> club tournament organized by <a href="DIRECTV">DIRECTV</a> between July 16 and July 22 in the <a href="University%20of%20Phoenix%20Stadium">University of Phoenix Stadium</a> in <a href="Glendale%2C%20Arizona">Glendale, Arizona</a>, USA. 
The tournament was divided in two groups of three, who played each other once, with the top club in each group progressing to the final match. The champion, <a href="Cruz%20Azul">Cruz Azul</a>, received $250,000 <a href="USD">USD</a>.
Venue.
All seven matches were held at the <a href="University%20of%20Phoenix%20Stadium">University of Phoenix Stadium</a>, with a total capacity of some 70,000 people.
Goalscorers.
3 Goals
2 Goals
1 Goal
